jobs.title: Jobs & Workflows Configuration
jobs.description: Configure Databricks job cluster and enable background workflows

jobRuns.dialogDescription: Recent execution history for this workflow
jobRuns.emptyState: No runs found for this workflow

roles.title: Role Based Access Control
roles.description: Define application roles and assign permissions to directory groups.

dialog.description: Define the role name, assigned groups, feature permissions, and approval privileges.

general.assignedGroupsHelp: Users belonging to these groups will inherit this role's permissions.

homeSections.title: Home Sections
homeSections.description: Select which sections appear on the home page for users with this role.

approvalPrivileges.title: Approval Privileges
approvalPrivileges.description: Grant this role the ability to approve specific types of requests.

featurePermissions.title: Feature Permissions
featurePermissions.description: Configure access levels for each feature in the application.

deployment.title: Deployment Policy
deployment.description: Control which Unity Catalog catalogs/schemas users with this role can deploy to. Supports wildcards (* for any) and template variables ({username}, {email}).

allowedCatalogs.label: Allowed Catalogs (comma-separated)
allowedCatalogs.help: Leave empty to prevent deployments. Use * to allow all catalogs.

allowedSchemas.label: Allowed Schemas (comma-separated, optional)
allowedSchemas.help: Leave empty to allow any schema within allowed catalogs.
